title: Ticket #3486: Document GRACEFULLY_REMOVE_JOBS for signal escalation semantics fix
description: Add documentation of the GRACEFULLY_REMOVE_JOBS config knob. This is a schedd param that controls whether jobs are gracefully removed by default. It can be overridden by a job setting want_graceful_removal in the description file. The default value is TRUE.
remarks: Abandoning this ticket. We do not introduce documentation tickets; documentation commits go into the original code ticket. The reason we don't just introduce doc tickets like these is that these doc tickets become a way to dump documentation tasks on Karen and then forget them while getting credit for resolving the code ticket.
creator: rrati
